messages.subject: My apologies
messages.msgSnippet: Good Evening Everyone! I am sending a quick apology for all of you whom have received those annoying bounces due to me. I went away for the weekend and ended
messages.messageBody:
Good Evening Everyone!

I am sending a quick apology for all of you whom have received those annoying
bounces due to me. I went away for the weekend and ended up stuck in Markel,
Indiana. The people there are wonderful, but I wish that my van did not break
down. I am home now, and have cleaned out my email.
Again, I am sorry...
Forgive me? :)

Blessings,
Stephanie
Teacher and Mommy of 4 homeschooling fanatics, wife to the best principal,
protector of many pets and wild ones, and unpublished writer.

***Life's Learnings Academy - Protecting Our Children***
IT'S GREAT TO LEARN WHERE THE PRINCIPAL LOVES YOU
ICQ: 43428000 AOL IM: Lifeslearn
